title: [Epidemiology] The spread of COVID-19 in Brazil overwhelmed the health systems in all the country's regions, particularly in areas where they were already fragile. A large percentage of COVID-19 patients that were hospitalised in Brazil required intensive care and respiratory support, and many did not survive.

[Epidemiology] Saliva similarly sensitive to uncomfortable nasopharyngeal swabs for SARS-CoV-2 detection, substantially cheaper saving >$600,000 USD per 100,000 people tested, new meta-analysis of 37 studies and 7332 paired samples
